description:
In this New Year`s special homage to classic films, the T.A.P Gun team and the Black Fighter battle the mysterious Monster G!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: First Dream of the New Year! Jingoro the Giant Monster Strikes Back!
Hatsuyume da yo! Dai Kaijuu Jingoro no Gyakushuu
初夢だよ! 大怪獣ジンゴロの逆襲
